"A.P.238/4/8": "That battle competition I mentioned before? It's coming up soon."
"Are you interested? Are you going to go?"
"...Well, do what you want. It doesn't matter to me."
"Oh, just one thing, apparently you're not allowed to go it alone."
"According to the rules, in order to participate, you have to invite someone to partner up with you."
"...With skills like yours, anyone you invite would come running, wouldn't they."
"I suppose it's none of my business. If you can't do it solo, there's no place for me."
"...Hey now, what's with that face? I already told you I don't care."
"Well, I guess if you're by yourself and you're feeling lonely, I could always lend you a hand."
